content: तांडवः --वं {@--1@} Dancing in general; मदतांडवोत्सवांते <ls>U. 3. 18</ls>; भ्रू° dance or playful movement of the eyebrows; <ls n="U.">3. 19.</ls> {@--2@} Particularly, the frantic or violent dance of Śiva; त्र्यंबकानंदि वस्तांडवं देवि भूयादभीष्ट्यै च हृष्ट्यै च नः <ls>Māl. 5. 23</ls>, <ls n="Māl.">1. 1.</ls> {@--3@} The art of dancing. {@--4@} A sort of grass. {@--5@} (In prosody) A foot of three short syllables.

तांडवः --वं {@--1@} Dancing in general; मदतांडवोत्सवांते <ls>U. 3. 18</ls>; भ्रू° dance or playful movement of the eyebrows; <ls n="U.">3. 19.</ls> {@--2@} Particularly, the frantic or violent dance of Śiva; त्र्यंबकानंदि वस्तांडवं देवि भूयादभीष्ट्यै च हृष्ट्यै च नः <ls>Māl. 5. 23</ls>, <ls n="Māl.">1. 1.</ls> {@--3@} The art of dancing. {@--4@} A sort of grass. {@--5@} (In prosody) A foot of three short syllables.
